memberdef.argsstring: (bool enabled, uint32_t binding, core::gfx::blend_factor srcColorBlend, core::gfx::blend_factor dstColorBlend, core::gfx::blend_op colorBlendOp, core::gfx::blend_factor srcAlphaBlend, core::gfx::blend_factor dstAlphaBlend, core::gfx::blend_op alphaBlendOp, core::gfx::component_bits colorFlags=(core::gfx::component_bits::r|core::gfx::component_bits::g|core::gfx::component_bits::b|core::gfx::component_bits::a))
memberdef.name: blendstate

parameterdescription.para: is the blendstate active (true) or not (false).
the binding location of the blend state.
the operation to apply to the RGB components when loading.
the operation to apply to the RGB components with our newly created color data.
the blend operation to apply to the RGB components.
the operation to apply to the A component when loading.
the operation to apply to the A component with our newly created alpha data.
the blend operation to apply to the A component.
the color component masking flags to use.

briefdescription.para: describes the blend operation (source/destination) per color component in the render operation.
